results.title: Improvement of acanthosis nigricans on isotretinoin and metformin.
results.text_hl: We report a case of a 55-year-old @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ male who developed @DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@ with striking @DISEASE_Papilloma @DISEASE_MESH:D010212 @@@papillomatosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hairy_palms_and_soles</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535620 @@@tripe palms@@@ who experienced improvement on a long-term tapering dosage of @CHEMICAL_Isotretinoin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015474 @@@isotretinoin@@@, with additional benefit with the addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Walling HW, Messingham M, Myers LM, Mason CL, Strauss JS. Improvement of acanthosis nigricans on isotretinoin and metformin. J Drugs Dermatol. 2003 Dec;2(6):677-81. PMID: 14711151
